name: Escort Incorperated
description:
My entry for the GMTK jam 2021 for the theme "joined together". 

This game is a parody of the most annoying kind of missions commonly found in video games. 

In escort missions, the player's success is dependent on the actions of the escortee, who is often not nearly as co-operative as one would like. This is my approach to the theme joined together, as the player is joined to the client for the duration of an escort mission.

Contributors:

Auer Felix: ideas and writing
Me: Everything else
